# Environments

### Base endpoints:

* Sandbox environment: **https://sandbox-payments.finrax.com**  
  Key for checking the authenticity of a Finrax [callback ](references/callbacks/)on the sandbox environment: 

  ```text
  
  ```

* Production environment: **https://payments.finrax.com**  
  Key for checking the authenticity of a Finrax [callback](references/callbacks/) on the production environment: 

  ```text
  
  ```

{% hint style="info" %}
Bear in mind that the sandbox version operates with the real blockchain in order to provide a complete replica of the production environment.
{% endhint %}
